title: 25 Winter Wedding Guest Outfits, From Sequined Dresses To Printed Pantsuits
description: If you haven’t already, it’s time to start planning your winter wedding guest outfits. Whether you’re looking for a new party dress or are partial to formal pants, we’re here to help you get the ball rolling on your search for what to wear to this season's nuptials. These festivities are a chance to play around with seasonal colors and dazzling fabrics, which can then be worn during the holidays — think festive velvet dresses and long-sleeve jumpsuits for more formal affairs, or sequin numbers that embody that end-of-year vibe.We’ve rounded up 25 winter wedding guest outfit ideas for every dress code, budget, and personal style. Ahead, find the best winter dresses, jumpsuits, and pantsuits from reader-favorite retailers like Free People, Reformation, Zara, and more that’ll get you on the best-dressed list.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Black-tie Wedding Guest DressesFormal winter weddings likely require black-tie dresses, which should probably be floor-length but certainly don’t have to be black. For the colder months, look out for long-sleeve gowns in luxe velvets or weightier sequins in rich jewel tones. Then throw on a faux fur shawl, slip into comfortable heels, and swipe on burgundy lipstick to complete your ensemble.Shop Ralph LaurenRalph Lauren Velvet Scoopneck Tank Dress, $, available at Ralph LaurenClub L London Satin Feather Trim Maxi DressShop Club L LondonClub L London Satin Feather Trim Maxi Dress, $, available at Club L LondonEloquii Paillette Sequin Maxi DressShop EloquiiEloquii Paillette Sequin Maxi Dress, $, available at EloquiiMichael Costello x Revolve Loren GownShop RevolveMichael Costello x revolve Loren Gown, $, available at RevolveShow Me Your Mumu Greta DressShop Show Me Your MumuShow Me Your Mumu Greta Dress, $, available at Show Me Your MumuCocktail Wedding Guest DressesCocktail attire is one of the most popular special-occasion dress codes, offering a balance between formal and casual, and allowing you (and the party) to move from day to night. It also opens you up to more silhouettes, hemline lengths, and fabrics. For the winter, we recommend midi dresses with delicate lace and mesh trims or elevated pearl embellishments. Shop ReformationReformation Plus Stasia Silk Dress, $, available at ReformationBardot Liyana Ruched Mesh DressShop RevolveBardot Liyana Ruched Mesh Dress, $, available at RevolveCorey Lynn Calter Valentina Sleeveless Midi DressShop AnthropologieCorey Lynn Calter Valentina Sleeveless Midi Dress, $, available at AnthropologieNever Fully Dressed Sequin Jem DressShop Never Fully DressedNever Fully Dressed Sequin Jem Dress, $, available at Never Fully DressedLulus Mesh Pearl One-Shoulder Midi DressShop LulusLulus Mesh Pearl One-Shoulder Midi Dress, $, available at LulusCasual Wedding Guest DressesFor winter weddings with outdoor ceremonies or restaurant receptions with casual, cozy vibes, keep your comfort (and warmth) top of mind. Slip into long-sleeve mini or midi dresses, and pair them with sheer black tights and a pair of booties or closed-toe pumps. (You also can’t go wrong with a velvet maxi.) And don’t be afraid of prints — play with festive plaids and winter florals.Shop Free PeopleFree People Nightingale Plaid Midi Dress, $, available at Free PeoplePetal & Pup Ginnee Puff Sleeve Cutout Midi DressShop Petal & PupPetal & Pup Ginnee Puff Sleeve Cutout Midi Dress, $, available at Petal & PupGood American Velvet Fit For Success Maxi DressShop Good AmericanGood American Velvet Fit For Success Maxi Dress, $, available at Good AmericanSelkie The London DressShop RevolveSelkie The London Dress, $, available at RevolveMadewell V-Neck Cuff-Sleeve Maxi DressShop MadewellMadewell V-Neck Cuff-Sleeve Maxi Dress, $, available at MadewellWedding Guest JumpsuitsWe love the idea of a jumpsuit for a winter wedding, because, let’s be honest: We don’t really want our legs exposed to the frigid winter air. To stay warm and comfortable while looking stylish, seek out long-sleeved, high-neck silhouettes in rich velvets and luxe jersey knits. Keep it sleek in black, or test out trendy burgundy, navy blue, or metallic silver styles.Shop City ChicCity Chic Plus Lana Jumpsuit, $, available at City ChicAbercrombie & Fitch Contrast Strapless JumpsuitShop Abercrombie & FitchAbercrombie & Fitch Contrast Strapless Jumpsuit, $, available at Abercrombie & FitchTopshop Midi Jacquard Jumpsuit With LaceShop AsosTopshop Midi Jacquard Jumpsuit With Lace, $, available at ASOSBar III Plus Size Metallic Jersey One-Shoulder JumpsuitShop Macy’sBar III Plus Size Metallic Jersey One-Shoulder Jumpsuit, $, available at Macy'sRamy Brook Gabriel Velvet Plunging JumpsuitShop Ramy BrookRamy Brook Gabriel Velvet Plunging Jumpsuit, $, available at Ramy BrookWedding Guest Pant SuitsThese days, pantsuits for wedding guests are more chic than ever before, so we want to put these matching separates on your radar. Be playful with metallic, floral, or velvet suits that can be worn on their own with a statement necklace, or with a blouse or vest underneath. When the party’s over, rewear the blazers and trousers for winter festivities and office days alike. Shop ZaraZara Wrinkle Look Sparkle Blazer, $, available at ZaraZara Wrinkled Effect Shiny Pants, $, available at ZaraAnn Taylor The Greenwich Blazer & Perfect Wide-Leg PantShop Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Greenwich Blazer, $, available at Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Perfect Wide-Leg Pant, $, available at Ann TaylorFarm Rio Night Jungle Blazer & Night Jungle Flare PantsShop Farm RioFarm Rio Navy Blue Night Jungle Blazer, $, available at Farm RioFarm Rio Navy Blue Night Jungle Flare Pants, $, available at Farm RioMango Cropped Velvet Vest & Velvet Wideleg PantsShop MangoMango Cropped Velvet Vest, $, available at MangoMango Velvet Wideleg Pants, $, available at MangoWildfang Empower Tux Blazer & Empower Trouser PantShop Urban OutfittersWildfang Empower Tux Blazer, $, available at Urban OutfittersWildfang Empower Trouser Pant, $, available at Urban OutfittersBlack-tie Wedding Guest DressesYour upcoming formal winter weddings will likely require black-tie dress, which should probably be floor-length but certainly doesn’t have to be black. For the colder months, look out for long-sleeve gowns in luxe velvets or weightier sequins in rich jewel tones. Once you find your perfect dress, throw on a faux fur shawl, slip into comfortable heels, and swipe on burgundy lipstick to complete your ensemble.Shop RixoRIXO Emory Embroidered Velvet Gown, $, available at RixoAtsu Crystal-Embellished Bow Mini DressShop AnthropologieAtsu Crystal-Embellished Bow Mini Dress, $, available at AnthropologieCasual Wedding Guest DressesFor winter weddings with outdoor ceremonies and cocktail hours or with more casual, cozy vibes, keep your comfort (and warmth) top of mind. Slip into long-sleeve mini and midi dresses with matching scarves or velvet maxis, and pair them with sheer black tights and a pair of booties or closed-toe pumps.Shop Free PeopleNigel Preston Velvet Maxi Dress, $, available at Free PeopleGood American Velvet Blazer Mini DressShop Good AmericanGood American Velvet Blazer Mini Dress, $, available at Good AmericanPomander Place Green Jacquard Samantha DressShop TuckernuckPomander Place Green Jacquard Samantha Dress, $, available at TuckernuckPetal & Pup Francesca Floral Midi Dress & ScarfShop Petal & PupPetal & Pup Francesca Floral Midi Dress & Scarf, $, available at Petal & PupAbercrombie & Fitch High-Neck Draped JumpsuitShop Abercrombie & FitchSkims High-Neck Draped Jumpsuit, $, available at SkimsAnn Taylor Belted Shawl-Collar Blazer & Straight Leg PantShop Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Belted Shawl-Collar Blazer in Fluid Crepe, $, available at Ann TaylorAnn Taylor The Straight Leg Pant in Fluid Crepe, $, available at Ann TaylorLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?28 Holiday Party Dresses For Winter SoiréesShop Anthropologie’s New Wedding Dress CollectionThe 30 Best Winter Dresses For Every Occasion
author: Victoria Montalti

html:
Photo: Courtesy of Ann Taylor.

If you haven’t already, it’s time to start planning your winter wedding guest outfits. 
Whether you’re looking for a new party dress or are partial to formal pants, we’re here to help you get the ball rolling on your search for what to wear to this season's nuptials. These festivities are a chance to play around with seasonal colors and dazzling fabrics, which can then be worn during the holidays — think festive velvet dresses and long-sleeve jumpsuits for more formal affairs, or sequin numbers that embody that end-of-year vibe.

We’ve rounded up 25 winter wedding guest outfit ideas for every dress code, budget, and personal style. Ahead, find the best winter dresses, jumpsuits, and pantsuits from reader-favorite retailers like Free People, Reformation, Zara, and more that’ll get you on the best-dressed list.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

1 of 25

Black-tie Wedding Guest Dresses

Formal winter weddings likely require black-tie dresses, which should probably be floor-length but certainly don’t have to be black. For the colder months, look out for long-sleeve gowns in luxe velvets or weightier sequins in rich jewel tones. Then throw on a faux fur shawl, slip into comfortable heels, and swipe on burgundy lipstick to complete your ensemble.

Shop Ralph Lauren

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 25

Eloquii Paillette Sequin Maxi Dress

Shop Eloquii

4 of 25

Michael Costello x Revolve Loren Gown

Shop Revolve

6 of 25

Cocktail Wedding Guest Dresses

Cocktail attire is one of the most popular special-occasion dress codes, offering a balance between formal and casual, and allowing you (and the party) to move from day to night. It also opens you up to more silhouettes, hemline lengths, and fabrics. For the winter, we recommend midi dresses with delicate lace and mesh trims or elevated pearl embellishments.

Shop Reformation

7 of 25

Bardot Liyana Ruched Mesh Dress

Shop Revolve

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 25

Corey Lynn Calter Valentina Sleeveless Midi Dress

Shop Anthropologie

10 of 25

Lulus Mesh Pearl One-Shoulder Midi Dress

Shop Lulus

11 of 25

For winter weddings with outdoor ceremonies or restaurant receptions with casual, cozy vibes, keep your comfort (and warmth) top of mind. Slip into long-sleeve mini or midi dresses, and pair them with sheer black tights and a pair of booties or closed-toe pumps. (You also can’t go wrong with a velvet maxi.) And don’t be afraid of prints — play with festive plaids and winter florals.

Shop Free People

12 of 25

Petal & Pup Ginnee Puff Sleeve Cutout Midi Dress

Shop Petal & Pup

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 25

Good American Velvet Fit For Success Maxi Dress

Shop Good American

14 of 25

Selkie The London Dress

Shop Revolve

15 of 25

Madewell V-Neck Cuff-Sleeve Maxi Dress

Shop Madewell

16 of 25

Wedding Guest Jumpsuits

We love the idea of a jumpsuit for a winter wedding, because, let’s be honest: We don’t really want our legs exposed to the frigid winter air. To stay warm and comfortable while looking stylish, seek out long-sleeved, high-neck silhouettes in rich velvets and luxe jersey knits. Keep it sleek in black, or test out trendy burgundy, navy blue, or metallic silver styles.

Shop City Chic

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

18 of 25

Topshop Midi Jacquard Jumpsuit With Lace

Shop Asos

19 of 25

Bar III Plus Size Metallic Jersey One-Shoulder Jumpsuit

Shop Macy’s

20 of 25

Ramy Brook Gabriel Velvet Plunging Jumpsuit

Shop Ramy Brook

21 of 25

Wedding Guest Pant Suits

These days, pantsuits for wedding guests are more chic than ever before, so we want to put these matching separates on your radar. Be playful with metallic, floral, or velvet suits that can be worn on their own with a statement necklace, or with a blouse or vest underneath. When the party’s over, rewear the blazers and trousers for winter festivities and office days alike. 

Shop Zara

22 of 25

Ann Taylor The Greenwich Blazer & Perfect Wide-Leg Pant

Shop Ann Taylor

23 of 25

Farm Rio Night Jungle Blazer & Night Jungle Flare Pants

Shop Farm Rio
